note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices. Depending on the country and year, it relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Share of population living in extreme poverty vs. mean income or consumption per day
subtitle: Extreme poverty is defined as living below the International Poverty Line of 2.15 international-$ per day. This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.
